thing-type.label: Heating Device
thing-type.description: Heating device such as a boiler

channel-type.label: Common Supply Temperature
channel-type.description: Shows the status and the value of the temperature sensor located on the exit of the boiler

channel-type.label: Boiler Target Temperature
channel-type.description: Shows the set target temperature value of the boiler

channel-type.label: Burner Modulation
channel-type.description: Shows the current burner modulation in percent

channel-type.label: Burner Hours
channel-type.description: Shows statistics of burner: hours and times started

channel-type.label: Burner Starts
channel-type.description: Shows statistics of burner: hours and times started

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit Circulation Pump
channel-type.description: Shows the state of the circulation pump (on, off) for heating circuit N

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit Frost Protection
channel-type.description: Shows whether frost protection of the installation is turned on for the device

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit Supply Temperature
channel-type.description: Shows the status and the value of the supply temperature sensor for circuit N

channel-type.label: DHW Outlet Temperature
channel-type.description: Shows the status and the value of the temperature sensor located in the hot water storage at the outlet

channel-type.label: DHW Storage Temperature
channel-type.description: Shows the status and the value of the temperature sensor located in the hot water storage

channel-type.label: DHW Target Temperature
channel-type.description: Shows the target temperature value of the domestic hot water (DHW).

channel-type.label: Outside Temperature
channel-type.description: Shows the temperature value of the outside temperature sensor

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit Heating Curve Slope
channel-type.description: Shows the values for slope and shift of the heating curve

channel-type.label: Heating Circuit Heating Curve Shift
channel-type.description: Shows the values for slope and shift of the heating curve
